<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Studio checkpoint"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/studios/{sessionId}/checkpoints/{checkpointId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the details of the given Studio checkpoint ID. Append `?workspaceId=` to get a checkpoint in a workspace context.
